subject: Re: 2 New Files are in my Radio Shack Folder
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Thanx, i have great contacts and communication.  I get very similar 
results with every box i have tested so far, i just like to put my 
files up for everyone to hear.  Sharing the files is the key to great 
research, i can tell people i get great communication but i'd rather 
show them.  It adds validity to my claims.

-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, juli velazquez <ghostchasingfool@...> 
wrote:
>
> Steve, Great Validation!!
> 
> Steve Hultay <urkel23@...> wrote:          
> Just look at the date to see the 2 files from today. I was 
verifying 
> communication for others to hear. So i used Babs as an example of 
an 
> uncommon name as well as mine and bruce's name. The first file 
> probably got lost on this board at this point with all the audio 
> uploads recently....JULI !!!!! Just kidding, but listen to the 2 
new 
> files from today in the folder and let me know what you guys think. 
I 
> already know i have good communication with my two friends on the 
other 
> side named Mike and Lisa, but i want to show others that what i get 
is 
> real. If anybody wants to do a test session through Skype just e-
mail 
> me and we can set something up.
> 
> Thanx,
> -Steve H.
>
